articles.title: I’ve given birth to ‘Ed Sheeran’s’ baby… I named her after the singer’s wife... - The Scottish Sun
articles.content:
AN Ed Sheeran lookalike has had a baby girl and named her after the singers wife.
Ty Jones, 27, and his partner Amanda Baron, 37, welcomed their first child together.

articles.title: Ryan Gosling as Ken in the new Barbie film is a masterstroke of casting - The Guardian
articles.description: And Margot Robbie in the lead role is just as perfect. So what other Hollywood A-listers could we tee up for the next toy-franchise adaptation?

articles.title: Princess Charlene of Monaco joins Prince Albert during balcony appearance for Catholic festival - Daily Mail
articles.description: Charlene of Monaco appeared alongside Albert and her daughter during a balcony appearance for the Catholic festival, Corpus Christi.  It's unclear why Jacques can't be seen on the balcony with them.
articles.content:
Princess Charlene of Monaco put on a sombre display in an all-black ensemble when joining her husband Prince Albert and their seven-year-old daughter Princess Gabriella today.
